org.jclouds.aws.ec2

Interface AWSEC2Api

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, EC2Api

    public interface AWSEC2Api
extends EC2Api
    Provides synchronous access to EC2 services.
    Author:
    Adrian Cole
